text: Out of the Blue is the debut of Claudia Carawan, and derives its sound from several styles including soul, old school R&B;, reggae and jazz. The lyrics of the album lean heavily on messages of hope, love, and inspiration. The album was released to positive reviews; Andy Garrigue commented that "Both sultry and righteous, sassy and pouting, Carawan's got a hair raising set of pipes. She sets a mood impossible to ignore."CD Baby: "" ==Track listing== # "The Journey" - 4:13 # "The People Who Love You" - 4:09 # "Love Came Home" - 4:56 # "Everything I Need" - 5:00 # "Guardian Angel" - 4:16 # "Leap of Faith" - 3:54 # "I Wish You Well" - 4:49 # "It's Gonna Come Back To You" - 3:31 # "Count Your Blessings (Instead of Sheep)" (Irving Berlin) - 4:25 # "Brighter Day" - 6:14 # "What a Wonderful World" (Bob Thiele / George David Weiss) - 2:42 ==References== ==External links== *Lyrics for Out of the Blue Category:2003 albums
title: Out of the Blue (Claudia Carawan album)
